Downtown Southside Inbound

Description:

The Downtown Southside Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Henry & State Streets in Downtown Binghamton, and Vestal Avenue, Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton, while also making stops at the BC Junction Bus Terminal and Mirabito Stadium enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:


Weekends:

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Downtown Southside Inbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.
